summary: Enhanced vibrancy, anti-alias and sharpness to all creatures of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION:
working on getting more pictures, will upload them soon.


Creature Vibrancy
Version 1.0
Please Endorse.
===========================
By: McMuffinMarauder
===========================
========:Contents:=========

01) Mod Description
02) Features
03) Other Plans
04) Version History
05) Known Bugs
06) Install/Uninstall
07) Other Info
08) My Other Mods!
09) Credit
10) Tools Used

===========================
01: Description
===========================

Adds vibrancy to the creatures of skyrim! This includes
all creature-actors, critters such as butterflies, and ambient bugs.
This is simply a mod that brings out the potential color, and detail that
the players of Skyrim deserve to experience. Mainly, I edited the saturation,
lightness, anti-alias, and sharpness of all the textures, resulting in a HQ
and colorful creature mass-retexture.

===========================
02: Features
===========================

-Color
-Detail
-More visable
-Includes; all creatures, and ambient bug FX.

===========================
03: Other Plans
===========================

At some point, I may make a complete HD texture for those who do not
prefer vibrancy.

===========================
04: Install/Uninstall
===========================

Extract the \"textures\" folder in to the
\"program files\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\" directory. click yes-to-all if asked to replace.

===========================
05: Version History
===========================

V1.0: Initial Release

Vibrancy to all creatures of skyrim

===========================
06: Known Bugs
===========================

None

===========================
07: Compatiblity
===========================

Will not work with any other mod that replaces the textures of a creature.
pick one or the other :b.

===========================
08: Other Info
===========================

Check out my other mods:
Tainted Glass Armor - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6716
Tainted Glass Weapons - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6732
Vibrant Interface - Coming soon!
Vibrant Landscape - Coming soon!
VibrantFX - Coming soon!
Vibrant Clutter - Coming soon!
Vibrant Armor - Coming soon!
Vibrant Weapons - Coming soon!

===========================
09: Credit\\Legal
===========================

All credit goes to me for the creation of this mod.

If you use this mod in any project of yours, please credit me as the creator of \"creature vibrancy\"

===========================
10: Tools Used
===========================

GIMP 2.0

===========================
By: McMuffinMarauder
===========================
